channel.title: Compile problem.. unrecongized option: -d
channel.description:
I don't understand how to fix I tried to change some things still nothing :palm:
What it says when I try to compile
Unrecognized option: -d Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatale exeption has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue...
The compile is @echo off title Server Compiling... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin\java.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\clip\region\*.java src\server\clip\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause
Please help !

item.title: Compile problem.. unrecongized option: -d
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

You’re using java not javac in your command

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problem.. unrecongized option: -d
item.dc:creator: @D_3_4_T_H_317 D 3 4 T H 317
item.description:
@D_3_4_T_H_317 wrote:

I don’t understand how to fix I tried to change some things still nothing :palm:

What it says when I try to compile

Unrecognized option: -d
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatale exeption has occurred. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue…

The compile is
@echo off
title Server Compiling…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_25\bin\java.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\clip\region*.java src\server\clip*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause

Please help !

Read full topic
